name: Ship Away
description:
Ship Away is a game of manage your time and see the story of ex ship travellers

The objective is manage your time to make food for the crew and fuel the fornace, can you make this?   

Controls

A-D for move horizontaly

W-S for move verticaly in ladders

Space for jump

S for interact with objects

K for grab and drop items

Enter for confirm in menus

Esc for return in menus and pause the game
